trans-unit.source: The TopLevelNameCollection class is a read-only collection that contains <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> objects.
Determines if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> object is in this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> object to search for in this collection.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> object is in this collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
name is .
Copies all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> objects in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> objects that receives the elements of this collection.
The zero-based index in `names` where this method starts copying this collection.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The destination array is not large enough, based on the source collection size and the index parameter that was specified.
names is .
The index specified is out of range of the destination array.
Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> object in this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> object to search for in this collection.
The zero-based index of the first matching object.
Returns -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
name is .
The Item property gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> object in this collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> object to get.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelName"></xref> that is located at the specified index.
The index parameter that was specified is out of range of the collection.
